newsitem.title: UK: Czarnikow sees EU 96/97 sugar output at 17.9 mln t.
newsitem.headline: Czarnikow sees EU 96/97 sugar output at 17.9 mln t.

text.p: European Union sugar output will total 17.9 million tonnes raw value in 1996/97, up on the 17.03 million estimated earlier, trade house Czarnikow Sugar said.
Output in 1995/96 was also 17.03 million tonnes, it said in its latest monthly report.
